description: A collection of text variable instances.

properties.description: The number of objects in the collection.
properties.name: length

methods.description: Displays the number of elements in the TextVariableInstance.
methods.name: count

methods.description: Creates a text variable instance at the specified location.

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: The location relative to the reference object or within the containing object. (Optional)

The reference object. Note: Required only when the to parameter specifies before or after. Can accept: TextVariableInstance, XmlStory, TextFrame, Story, Note, Cell, Footnote, Table, TextColumn, TextStyleRange, Text, InsertionPoint, Paragraph, Line, Word, Character or Change. (Optional)
parameters.name: reference

parameters.description: Initial values for properties of the new TextVariableInstance (Optional)
parameters.name: withProperties

methods.name: add

methods.description: Returns the TextVariableInstance with the specified index or name.

parameters.description: The index or name. Can accept: Long Integer or String.
parameters.name: index

methods.name: item

methods.description: Returns the TextVariableInstance with the specified name.
methods.name: itemByName

methods.description: Returns the TextVariableInstance with the specified ID.
methods.name: itemByID

methods.description: Returns the TextVariableInstances within the specified range.

parameters.description: The TextVariableInstance, index, or name at the beginning of the range. Can accept: TextVariableInstance, Long Integer or String.
parameters.name: from

parameters.description: The TextVariableInstance, index, or name at the end of the range. Can accept: TextVariableInstance, Long Integer or String.
parameters.name: to

methods.name: itemByRange

methods.description: Returns the first TextVariableInstance in the collection.
methods.name: firstItem

methods.description: Returns the last TextVariableInstance in the collection.
methods.name: lastItem

methods.description: Returns the middle TextVariableInstance in the collection.
methods.name: middleItem

methods.description: Returns the TextVariableInstance with the index previous to the specified index.

parameters.description: The index of the TextVariableInstance that follows the desired TextVariableInstance.
parameters.name: obj

methods.name: previousItem

methods.description: Returns the TextVariableInstance whose index follows the specified TextVariableInstance in the collection.

parameters.description: The TextVariableInstance whose index comes before the desired TextVariableInstance.
parameters.name: obj

methods.name: nextItem

methods.description: Returns any TextVariableInstance in the collection.
methods.name: anyItem

methods.description: Returns every TextVariableInstance in the collection.
methods.name: everyItem

methods.description: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the TextVariableInstance.
methods.name: toSource

methods.description: Returns the TextVariableInstance with the specified index.

name: TextVariableInstances
